short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for multi-website search on right-click context menus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FindMore is a powerful and efficient tool designed to be your shortcut to information. With its user-friendly interface and advanced search capabilities, FindMore enables you to quickly and easily find the information you need, when you need it. Whether you're looking for recipes, news, or anything in between, FindMore is the ultimate shortcut to all the information you could ever want or need. Try it today and see how easy it is to get the information you're looking for with FindMore.

Highlight text.
Right-click.
Click the FindMore button.
Find related content quickly and easily with FindMore.
